author: LMG Clips
description:
Thanks to our LMG clips sponsors dbrand, Dell, and Secretlab. You can check them out at the links below:

dbrand: https://dbrand.com/pcb
Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus and Luke discuss Anna’s Archive scraping hundreds of terabytes of Spotify metadata and audio in the name of preservation, and Spotify’s response shutting it down. They debate piracy, preservation, subscriptions, and where different people draw the moral line across music, movies, books, and education.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i_cIhvzoKEM

title: They Scraped ALL of Spotify
